Name: Slaughter Cannon
About the game: Slaughter Cannon is an addictive physics puzzle game with exciting and challenging levels of varying difficulty. Plunge your way through the atmosphere and take control of the killer cannon and destroy everything in your path! There are many unique buildings and levels in the game, so complete them all! Features of the game: - Many levels - Complete destruction of objects - Physics - Colorful graphics
